comments: By far one of the worst people I have met in my life, let alone prof. He is arrogant and rude and in incessantly telling his students they are stupid. He is at Grenfell Campus Memorial University now. I love Earth Science courses and was going to do a minor until he started teaching all the classes. I refuse to take anything he teaches. 177
Too bad he\'s not teaching this quarter. Could have gotten an A! Oh shish!
He was a good prof. Most of my friends got A\'s in his class.
I got 92% which made me happy. Then I found out 50-60% got A\'s and B\'s. Bummer!
I used to sit in the front row to see him smile!
WORST TEACHER EVER. He clearly knows a lot, but is incapable of teaching it. Arrogant and rude, not helpful at all. I\'m going to echo what everyone else said here...AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Dr. Rashid was the worst teacher I think i\'ve ever had. He taught this class like it was a masters class at MIT rather than a 100 level class at OSU. He was arrogant, rude, and didn\'t help any student that needed it. His tests and slides cover completely different material and he doesn\'t curve. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

I agree, he was very stubborn and when students asked questions he had that "You\'re wrong" air about him. Definately avoid him if you can, he is definately knowledgeable but does NOT do a good job conveying that knowledge to students, nor does he give a strong idea of what topics will be stressed heavily on the tests and which wont! AVOID

AVOID AT ALL COSTS! WORST professor I have EVER had (and I\'m a senior). Does not specify what is on the test, just says read, then when we all failed the test, he refused to curve it. Very rude, not helpful, stubborn, has no problem failing the whole class, doesn\'t use carmen, not cooperative, even his TAs have issues with him. AVOID AVOID AVOID!
